item.title: Online!
item.description: Introduction Welcome to my blog. Here I will share my experiences as well as my wins and losses as it pertains to software, virtualization, operating systems, infrastructure, and networking. The goal is to share information on topics and help spread the adoption of open source Unix systems, such as illumos and potentially FreeBSD. In the coming weeks, I would like to document bug fixes and create packages for others to use for the wider adoption of illumos specifically.
